channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- ThinkPad A285 BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- ThinkPad A285 BIOS

item.title: CVE-2020-8335|2024-09-16T18:04:17.802Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20a285%20bios
item.description: The BIOS tamper detection mechanism was not triggered in Lenovo ThinkPad A285, BIOS versions up to r0xuj70w; A485, BIOS versions up to r0wuj65w; T495 BIOS versions up to r12uj55w; T495s/X395, BIOS versions up to r13uj47w, while the emergency-reset button is pressed which may allow for unauthorized access.
